testcase.purpose: Validate if sample app SIMD function could work well
Check if SIMD icon display correctly
Check if SIMD can be installed
Check if SIMD can be launched
Check if SIMD can be orientation
Check if SIMD can be packed
Check if SIMD can be stopped
Check if SIMD can be switched
Check if SIMD can be uninstalled
Check if SIMD can be uninstalled with app running
